dmca.title: Legal
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave [mailto:dave@atomic-network.co.uk] 
Sent: Saturday, February 18, 2006 6:55 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Legal
Importance: High

Hi,

I would like to bring to your attention a site which is in direct vilation
of your AUP/Copyright Policy.

The site in question is a an illegal torrent site, which happens to be
containing some of my software on it. This is breaking my AUP for the
software as they are distrobuting it over the internet, for no charge.

www.worldchatforums.com/forum

The file which is breaking my terms and conditions can be located at:
http://www.worldchatforums.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=118

Which is the Dvd Studio Pro application for Mac, this is in a torrent form
held on thier servers.

I would kindly like you to request that either the torrents get removed from
the site, or the site is closed before another company decides they wish to
contact you.

I also have reasons to believe that they are using an illegal distrobution
of Invision Power Board, so I have also contacted them with this matter.

Thank you for your assistance.

I expect to see all copyright infringments off thier site shortly.

My Regards.

David Braun.
CEO Dvd Studio Pro.

-----------------------------------------------
